channel.title: Router and ISP stuff
channel.description: Sup. As I understand we need to flash router given by ISP with open-source firmware. We need this because with default firmware it's easier to hack router. So I want to ask what is safer: 1. Change ISP router with a router that is flashed with open source firmware 2. Change ISP router to a simple ethernet switch that is not configurable and do not have any settings 192.168.1.1

item.title: Router and ISP stuff
item.dc:creator: goldstein-otg
item.description:
Kerkel:

Change ISP router with a router that is flashed with open source firmware

This, if you can replace it, since most of them have crappy HW anyway.

Read full topic

item.description:
Sup. As I understand we need to flash router given by ISP with open-source firmware. We need this because with default firmware itâ€™s easier to hack router.
So I want to ask what is safer:

  1. Change ISP router with a router that is flashed with open source firmware
  2. Change ISP router to a simple ethernet switch that is not configurable and do not have any settings 192.168.1.1
